In England, in the seven days to 08 February, there were 399,681 new confirmed cases (706.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 01 February, there were 551,306 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 28% (151,625 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 13 February is 15,616,753 (27,615.8 cases per 100,000 population).
